actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable John P. East, a Senator from the State of North Carolina.

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Senator John P. East, of North Carolina.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the condolences of the House on the death of the Honorable John P. East, a Senator from the State of North Carolina.
